name: GTD
tag_list: technology, space, defense, aeronautics, engineering, critical-software, system-intgration, mission-critical, ground-segment, on-board-segment, avionics, operations, maintenance, high-tech
overview:
GTD is an eupopean engineering specialised in systems integration and critical software for aerospace and defense markets.

Designer, integrator and operator of product and mission critical computer systems. Rise to the challenges of its customers for design, integration and operation of innovative turnkey systems â€“ that is GTD’s mission.

The Space Business Unit offers world-class systems engineering solutions applied to system integration, training, and operations needs, including development and qualification of flight software, ground support equipment, launching facilities, software for control center, and special products.

GTD is one of the most advanced engineering company in defence and security applications and is certified accordingly by the most relevant European organisms. GTD keeps its technical expertise thanks to an active involvement in research & development programs directly related with the security domain.

offices.address1: Pol. Ind. La Carpetania Av. Leonardo Da Vinci
